events.message: The insured reported a vehicle accident involving a collision with a streetlight on April 30th during evening rush hour.
Claim was reviewed and categorized under Auto Accident due to reported car collision and property damage.
An insurance agent was assigned promptly to assist the claimant and ensure smooth handling of the vehicle accident claim.
Confirmation was sent to the claimant acknowledging receipt of their auto accident insurance claim and outlining next steps.
Request was made for the claimant to submit the police report, photographs of vehicle damage, and medical bills.
The claimant provided requested documents including police report and photos of the damaged vehicle within two days.
Investigation was initiated to verify the circumstances of the vehicle collision and extent of damages.
Investigation concluded confirming the accident details and validating documentation provided by the claimant.
A settlement was proposed to cover the repair costs and medical expenses related to the auto accident damage.
Claimant expressed satisfaction with the timely communication and offered positive feedback on claim handling.
The auto accident claim was formally approved following successful validation of submitted evidence and investigation.
Payment for the approved settlement amount was issued to the claimant covering all repair and medical costs.
The auto accident claim has been closed successfully after completion of all processing and payment issuance.
All documents and communications related to this auto accident claim were archived for record-keeping purposes.
